forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly this evening. Low 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
